title: Ultra-Cool Maldives Five-Star Overwater Pool Villa Glamour with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Roundtrip Seaplane Transfers
description:
Embrace ultra-cool vibes at The Standard, Maldives, a glamorous five-star resort that breathes new life into paradise. The Standard Hotels brand is globally renowned for redefining boutique hospitality, with iconic properties in the hottest destinations, including New York City, Ibiza and London. Discover The Standard's take on island luxury at its incredible Maldives resort. Unique touches like glittering disco balls in the bathrooms, an overwater dancefloor, a glitzy schedule of events and a floating seasonal waterpark make it clear this is a resort unlike any other.

Of course, the quintessential Maldives touches are there, too - a scenic seaplane ride takes guests to luxe private pool villas floating above the turquoise lagoon that houses a thriving house reef made for snorkelling. Spend your days exploring the natural beauty of the island - snorkelling, boating, deep diving or on a resort bike. Relax and refresh with luxe treatments at The Standard Spa, where a hammam, aroma steam room and scheduled yoga sessions await to pamper you. Dining options and bars are in abundance - over-18s can make use of the adults-only Beru Bar, an overwater club with a see-through dancefloor, while everyone will enjoy the relaxed vibes of Joos Café, classic Maldivian dishes at Guduguda and incredible buffets at Kula.

title: Ultra-Cool Maldives Five-Star Pool Villa Glamour with Private House Reef
description: Embrace ultra-cool vibes at The Standard, Maldives, a glamorous five-star resort that breathes new life into paradise. Unique touches like glittering disco balls in the bathrooms, an overwater dancefloor and a glitzy schedule of events make it clear this is a resort unlike any other. Of course, the quintessential Maldives touches are there, too - onsite, you'll find a house reef that's perfect for snorkelling, an adults-only pool with swim-up bar, a tranquil spa and a fun-filled kids' club.
